basic_info.description: Hey there, I'm Mohana, cruising through my final year of B.Tech in Computer Science at IIIT Pune. I'm all about that continuous improvement life and thrive in the hustle of dynamic academic spaces. I'm honored to be a recipient of the Google Women Engineers Scholarship and to have successfully completed a fulfilling software engineering internship at Microsoft, where I honed my skills and deepened my understanding of the field. But hey, I'm not just a code ninja â€“ I'm also a bookworm and a trek enthusiast! Check out my resume for the full scoop on my journey.

projects.title: DiveDash
projects.description: A D&I monitoring Dashboard to assist IT Firms in monitoring the employee diversity and integrity across different teams and different stages of the hiring process

projects.title: Paper - I
projects.description: Optimised Mobilenet model with Inception modules for classification of deepfaked images in mobile devices, Paper under review at Indian Academy of Sciences - SADHANA, Springer

projects.title: PCAM
projects.description: PCAM : Post Cultivation Agro Mentoring Software, a machine learning-based web app to provide end to end assistance for post cultivation activities

projects.title: SignDub - JIA
projects.description: SignDub is a chrome extension built using Python, OpenCV, JavaScript, Flask and, Autodesk Maya that converts a video into sign language. The sign language is depicted using a 3D-character 'Jia' simultaneously with the video.

projects.title: Paper - II
projects.description: GAN for CVD, It is a tool built using multiple General Adversarial Networks to recolor images such that color vision deficient people can recognize the contrast in colors. We can produce large amounts of data for advanced research in color vision deficiency through the tool.

projects.title: AID
projects.description: AID : Automated Interpreter for differently abled, an Android application for audibly impaired that converts speech to ASL on the go

projects.title: Data On Wheels
projects.description: Data on Wheels is a dashboard app developed using Plotly Dash, Python, Tableau, ad Docker for the automotive industry. It helps the car dealers to analyze and understand their patterns through interactive visualizations to make informed decisions.

projects.title: EldBud
projects.description: 'Eldbud' is an android app built uding Flutter, Dart, and Firebase. It helps senior citizens to use their smart phones without any external help. The app takes them through a simple two step process to perform any task on their mobile and redirects them to the required action page directly. It is a tech buddy for the elderly.

projects.title: LIT
projects.description: LIT - Learn Imagine Think, a web application which helps user to learn about frontend, backend, machine learning and cloud computing with its applications in real life.
